reviewText: I love Globus, and the DVD was great
Awesome concert
Entertaining and just plain awesome. For anyone who likes Bryan Adams this is a must
Sublime!
I like his pants.
Its Amazing!  The packed Wembley Stadium...Bryan Adams singing...It doesn't get any better than that!! :))
Great!!!!!

20 years of waiting, but it was all worth it! The one thing I really like in this concert compared to other BA's live recorded concerts is the keyboardist Tommy Mandel who plays piano and organ simultaneously in songs like Everything I Do and that really sounds different in a good way.

Great concert, BA before 70, 000 or something.  He wasn't huge in the U.S. at this point, so it's nice to see him getting the love by a huge crowd, and the band puts on a tremendous performance.  It's a 1996 video, but it looks fine and the sound is excellent, and he does some cool covers along with the usual BA material.  For fans of BA, an essential purchase.
Great concert and great video!  Only thing that would have made it perfect would be if it was in 5.1 and widescreen format.
Outstanding concert. Rates up there with Yanni, John Tesh, Tangerine Dream and many more.
Concert was the best. Proud to have it in my collection
Pop in this DVD in mid-party and everyone will be partying like it's 1996! Great concert!
songs selection was good but the sound quality was terribe the picture was ok
I'm glad this concert finally became available on DVD. Bryan at his best...
Great!

Brings back great memories as I was there! Still have the ticket stub! We are really spoilt having Bluray and 5.1 these days so considering this is 21 years old (and 20 years late) the quality is very good.
Despite the fact it was not recorded n 5.1 sound or 16:9 size, it's a terrific show. Don't hesitate; buy it; Great setlist and superb performance!
WORTH BUYING IT!
Is very Good
I love this DVD. It almost felt like I was actually there.  The love from the crowd and the energy these guys have is palpable. I love his concerts and I sure wish I could have been at this one.
